statements.select: SELECT thouse.HouseID , thouse.UserID , thouse.ProvinceID , thouse.CityID , thouse.Lat , thouse.Lng , thouse.AreaID , thouse.BusinessID , thouse.Address , thouse.RentType , thouse.HouseType , thouse.Room , thouse.Hall , thouse.Toilet , thouse.Kitchen , thouse.Balcony , thouse.Bed , thouse.Square , thouse.PeopleNumber , thouse.Title , thouse.HouseRemark , thouse.HousePhoto , thouse.RentPrice , thouse.Contact , thouse.Mobile , thouse.Status , thouse.PayStatus , thouse.PayAmount , thouse.CreateTime , thouse.UpdateTime , audit.AuditState , audit.Auditor , audit.UpdateTime AuditTime , rentstate.RentDate , rentstate.`status` RentStatus, rentstate.UpdateTime RentLastUpdateTime , breach.RentBeforeDays , breach.DeductDays , collect.CreateTime CollectTime FROM t_houseinfo thouse INNER JOIN t_houseaudit audit ON thouse.HouseID = audit.HouseID INNER JOIN t_houserentstate rentstate ON rentstate.HouseID = thouse.HouseID INNER JOIN t_housebreach breach ON thouse.HouseID = breach.HouseID INNER JOIN t_housecollect collect ON collect.HouseId = thouse.HouseID

select.dynamic:
where collect.IsDel=#IsDel#
collect.UserID = #UserID#
Order by collect.$OrderColumn$ $SortType$
LIMIT #BeginNum#,#TakeNum#
